features.featureTitle: Update the Innovations page (frontend/src/pages/InnovationsPage.tsx) so each innovation card displays an image beside the innovation content (title/description), using the user-uploaded files mapped as follows: Artifyer: The Canvas Experience -> "Artifyer The Canvas Experience.png"; Oil Spill Catcher (OSC) -> "OSC.png"; The GPR -> "The GPR.jpg".
